user_review: Had the pleasure of trying out this newly opened jerk (,Jamaican cuisine)  inspired resto and loved it!  The resto.is a tiny local and meant to be more of a takeout/delivery spot. However, they do have two tables of 4 seats. They are on ubereats, doordash and skip the dishes!  The owner is the same as Rasoi which is right across the street. We tried a few entrees and we loved their homemade pogo's made from scratch which were absolutely delicious!  The batter was so good!  We also had the jerk kitchen salad which was the most amazing delicious salad ever!  Their jerk chicken is absolutely to die for! Super flavorful , most and tender!  Next we shared their burgers and our favorite were the chicken and pork jerk burgers!! Yummy so original flavors and amazing!  This place is a true find in the St-henri area!  Definately recommend to try it!! I will definately go back.  Oh and forgot to mention ,  they have a great selection of Jamaican imported drinks! Check out the pics!

This is the first time I order from Le Jerk Spot. I used UberEats. I wasn't sure what to expect. I always passed by the restaurant, and was very curious about it. Finally it showed up on the UberEats app; I got very excited. I was very very happy that the menu has the vegetarian option. I ordered the jerk mushroom poutine. It came in a clear plastic bowl, and it was nicely presented. The poutine was delicious and it went beyond my expectations. Perfect amount of each ingredients. I can't wait to try other meals in menu with vegetarian options.

the food is good and also interesting flavors, the appetisers weren't what we expected. also the prices of the entreees were a bit much . but the jerk burger combo woah!!! so good!! rasta pasta also loved it!

The wait was brutal! Killed my whole lunch time waiting for food! But in their defence they were super busy, which in these times were restaurants aren't surviving, good for them! What I will say tho is the food was VERY GOOD! Lost 2 points for that wait! But I must pay my respect where it's due! The jerk was bomb!
I had a delicious jerk chicken sandwich the fries were delicious and the portions were very big. Highly recommend. I will be going back!

the jerk chicken burger was amazing. rasta pasta was meh. however, when i went, there were 4 people chatting in the very small restaurant with no masks or dividers. the cook wasn't wearing a mask either. not sure i'll be back for this reason. would love to see great things for this restaurant but really disappointed in the disregard for health and safety during a pandemic...
